plot: One unfortunate day in Galicia, a young married couple's toilet starts to do weird things: the cistern flushes alone, disturbing noises are heard, stains appear... When the woman ends up being groped and hassled, they decide to ask for help, but who's going to believe them?. A parody of 50's-style B SCI-FI flicks, with its threatening monster (a killer loo!), a terrorised scream-queen, a sceptical hero and an expert destructor of monsters.   Written by  coprofilms@hotmail.com
title: El váter susurra
